nodes.text: Ivax and Kiax were a pair of ancient Corellian trickster gods. The vast Kiax and Ivax Nebulae gas clouds were thus named in honor of the navigational havoc they played with starships traveling through the Greater Javin region of the Outer Rim Territories in the centuries prior to the Galactic Civil War.
Ivax and Kiax were created for "Galactic Gazetteer: Hoth and the Greater Javin," a 2004 online supplement for Wizards of the Coast's Star Wars Roleplaying Game.
